error.generation_failed: Automatic schedule generation failed. Check the logs for details.
error.invalid_json: Enter valid JSON for the nutrient schedule.
error.invalid_format: Provide a JSON list of schedule entries.

missing_lineage_species.title: Profile missing species reference
missing_lineage_species.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) points to species {species_id}, but that species profile was not found. Update the profile to use a valid species or create the missing species profile.

missing_lineage_parent.title: Profile missing parent reference
missing_lineage_parent.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) lists {parent_id} as a parent profile, but it could not be loaded. Remove the invalid parent reference or create the missing profile to restore inheritance.

invalid_profile_schema.title: Profile failed schema validation
invalid_profile_schema.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) contains invalid overrides: {issue_summary}. Update the profile JSON or remove the bad values and reload Horticulture Assistant.

dataset_health_failure.title: Reference dataset failed to load
dataset_health_failure.description: {dataset_label} ({dataset_path}) could not be loaded: {error}. Fix or remove the dataset override, then reload Horticulture Assistant.
